title: Juhor
text:
Juhor (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Јухор, ) is a <a href="mountains%20of%20Serbia">mountain</a> in central <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>, near the city of <a href="Para%C4%87in">Paraćin</a>. Its highest peak, "Veliki Vetren", is at an elevation of 774 metres above sea level. Juhor borders the river <a href="Velika%20Morava">Velika Morava</a> to its east and the territory of <a href="Leva%C4%8D">Levač</a> to its west.
Findings from the 3rd century BC in Veliki Vetren include a chest containing some 14 sets of weapons, harness gear, jewelry, and clothing accessories characteristic of knights of <a href="Dacians">Dacian</a> and <a href="Scordisci">Scordisci</a> origin.
